content:
BitmapEffectCollection Class

In this Article

Note: This API is now obsolete. The non-obsolete alternative is Effect. Represents a collection of BitmapEffect objects. This collection is used as part of a BitmapEffectGroup to apply multiple bitmap effects to visual content.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class BitmapEffectCollection : System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable, System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>, System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>, System.Collections.IList

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • DispatcherObject
  • DependencyObject
  • Freezable
  • System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
  • BitmapEffectCollection

Methods summary

Add(BitmapEffect)

Note: This API is now obsolete. The non-obsolete alternative is Effect. Adds a BitmapEffect at the end of the collection.
Clear()

Note: This API is now obsolete. The non-obsolete alternative is Effect. Removes all effects from the collection.
Clone()

Note: This API is now obsolete. The non-obsolete alternative is Effect. Creates a modifiable clone of this BitmapEffectCollection, making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

CloneCurrentValue()

Note: This API is now obsolete. The non-obsolete alternative is Effect. Creates a modifiable clone of this BitmapEffectCollection object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

  • Contains(BitmapEffect)

    Note: This API is now obsolete. The non-obsolete alternative is Effect. Indicates whether the collection contains the specified BitmapEffect.

    public bool Contains (System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect value);

    Parameters

    • value
      BitmapEffect

      The bitmap effect to locate in the collection.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the collection contains value; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to Count. That is, this method is an O(n) operation, where n is Count.

    This method determines equality by calling Equals.
